name: Cyberdimension Neptunia: 4 Goddesses Online
summary: The story starts out with the Neptune and friends playing "4 Goddesses Online" and they begin to notice the existence of new characters, and then proceed to fight enemies. Also, there will be an enemy who is similar to Arfoire.

alternative_names.name: 四女神オンライン CYBER DIMENSION NEPTUNE

esrb.synopsis: This is an action role-playing game in which players assume the roles of goddesses playing a fantasy-oriented video game. From a third-person perspective, players control characters that explore worlds and battle fantastical enemies (e.g., jelly monsters, skeletons, demons, goblins) in melee combat. Characters use swords, spears, and magic spells to attack enemies; battles are highlighted by cries of pain and impact sounds. Some sequences depict female characters wearing revealing costumes that display large amounts of cleavage; a handful of scenes depict jiggling/bouncing breasts. The dialogue also contains some suggestive material (e.g., “[S]he's occasionally frustrated with her shortcomings in the, um, chest area...” and "[I]s this very low-angle camera a function made for panty sommeliers?”). The word “bastard” appears in dialogue.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters - Sexual images and/or sexual innuendo - Mild bad language
